My name is Josh Sullivan and I like to solve problems. I live in Bend, Oregon, with my son. I'm into Ruby, responsive design, evolution, and Edward Tufte.

When I'm not conquering video games with Henry, I'm planning conferences, building apps, and developing a better platform at G5.
